title: Respite care prescribed as medical necessity
description: Respite care prescribed as medical necessity
content:
Scenario: Respite care prescribed as medical necessity
    Given caregiver burnout threatens James's ability to provide care
    And respite is essential for sustainable caregiving
    When the healthcare_elohim advocates for respite
    Then respite care should be prescribed as medical necessity
    And insurance should cover respite like other medical care
    And providers should understand caregiver burnout is medical concern
    And James's health should be recognized as essential care infrastructure
    And healthcare system should support caregiver sustainability
